mva2.adapter

Class NestedSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • mva2.adapter.Section
      • mva2.adapter.NestedSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeaderSection, TreeSection

    public class NestedSection
extends Section
implements Notifier
    NestedSection is a section which can host multiple other section.

    When you need a group of section to have different behaviour than parent, then you can put those section inside the NestedSection and set the desired behaviour to the NestedSection. For example, if the parent has selectionMode as MULTIPLE and for a group of sections you want them to have SINGLE as the selection mode, you can put those group of section inside the NestedSection and set the selection mode for the NestedSection as SINGLE.
